text:
Hello everyone!
I'm Aksh, and I'm very excited to join the R Project community on Slack.
I'm currently preparing to apply for *Google Summer of Code 2026* and am keen to contribute to the R Foundation's projects. I'm actively looking to understand the codebase, learn the contribution workflow, and get involved in open-source development here. I'm eager to apply and expand my skills while helping the project.
I would be grateful for any advice on how to start, which projects or areas are good for newcomers, or suggestions for beginner-friendly issues (perhaps labeled as `good first issue` or similar).
My GitHub username is <https://github.com/aksh08022006|aksh08022006> .
Thank you so much, and I look forward to learning and contributing!

Hello everyone!
I’m Parth, and I’m excited to join the R Project community on Slack.
I’m preparing to apply for Google Summer of Code 2026 and am interested in contributing to the R Foundation’s projects. I’m currently exploring the codebase, learning the contribution workflow, and looking for beginner-friendly issues (such as those labeled “good first issue”).
I’d really appreciate any guidance on where to start or which areas are suitable for newcomers.
GitHub: parth1306sharma (<https://github.com/parth1306sharma>)
Looking forward to learning and contributing!
